Desc.entry: One bedroom flats for men and women aged over 60 years. Applicants are taken from Sheffield City Council Housing Services rehousing list. Property is advertised in Sheffield Homes Property Shop paper and on the internet. Applicants need to express their interest in the property by making a bid by telephone, internet or at the property shop/area office. Bidding is for one week only (Wed-Tues). Priority is given to people with medical points and/or waiting time points.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Contact via Sheffield City Council Area Housing Offices

category.entry: ACCOMMODATION FOR OLDER PEOPLE - UNSUPERVISED HOUSING
